message: I propose dividing the $10000 with an 80/20 split in favor of Alice, due to the higher risk of inflation over time.

I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. While I understand the risk of inflation, I believe a more balanced split is fair, especially since I am the one taking the risk of you rejecting this offer and moving to another round.
Considering the inflation impact, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This aims to compensate for the potential loss in value over time while acknowledging the risk involved.
